name: Fear the Dead
description: In Fear the Dead you play as young teacher named Eizabeth who is trying to do the best out of her worst situation. You are on the mission of finding your mom when all hell brake loose and try to survive by any means necessary.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 900 MB available space
